title: What is React?
content: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It is maintained by Facebook and a community of individual developers and companies.

title: Why use React?
content: React is a popular choice for building user interfaces because it allows developers to build reusable UI components. It also provides a virtual DOM, which makes it efficient to update the UI.

title: How do I get started with React?
content: To get started with React, you can install it using npm or yarn. You can also use a tool like Create React App to set up a new React project.

title: What are the key features of React?
content: React has several key features, including a virtual DOM, JSX, and component-based architecture. It also provides a rich ecosystem of libraries and tools for building complex applications.
